subject: health_science
title: Human Body Systems - Grade 7
content:
# Human Body Systems - Grade 7

## Learning Objectives
By the end of this lesson, students will be able to:
- Understand health concepts related to Skeletal System, Muscular System, Digestive System, Respiratory System
- Apply health knowledge to daily life
- Make informed decisions about personal and community health

## Introduction
This lesson covers Human Body Systems, focusing on Skeletal System, Muscular System, Digestive System, Respiratory System. Students will learn practical health information
relevant to Sri Lankan context and their daily lives.

## Main Content
This section covers Skeletal System, Muscular System, Digestive System, Respiratory System. Students will explore each topic through theoretical understanding and practical application.

## Health Guidelines
Evidence-based health recommendations

## Practical Applications
1. Personal health practices
2. Community health initiatives
3. Prevention strategies
4. Health promotion activities

## Case Studies
Real-life scenarios from Sri Lankan communities demonstrating health concepts.

## Activities
- Health assessments
- Group projects
- Community surveys
- Health promotion campaigns

## Assessment
Projects, presentations, practical demonstrations, and written tests.

## Resources
- Health Science textbook for Grade 7
- WHO and Ministry of Health guidelines
- Local health statistics
- Guest speakers from health sector
learning_outcomes: Analyze concepts related to Human Body Systems
